DOC.brief_summary: Cholangitis one main complication endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography ( ERCP ) . Plastic biliary stent use prevent occurrence post-ERCP cholangitis , stent take 1-2 week ERCP endoscope . 8.5 F plastic stent proximal flap discharge self-driven biliary gut , advantage avoid pull stent endoscope . The purpose study explore 8.5 F plastic stent proximal flap prevent post-ERCP cholangitis ERCP patient choledocholithiasis .
DOC.brief_title: Effect 8.5 F Plastic Stent Without Proximal Flap Prevention Post-ERCP Cholangitis
DOC.detailed_description: Since introduction 1968 , endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography ( ERCP ) become commonly perform endoscopic procedure , first choice management choledocholithiasis . Although endoscopic minimally invasive procedure , still certain complication ERCP , cholangitis one main complication . In European American country , plastic biliary stent use prevent occurrence post-ERCP cholangitis , stent take 1-2 week ERCP endoscope . In China endoscopic nasobiliary drainage usually adopt prevent post-ERCP cholangitis . Although nose bile duct convenient pull without endoscope , patient often feel nose pharynx ministry unwell obviously . 8.5 F plastic stent proximal flap discharge self-driven biliary gut , advantage avoid pull stent endoscope . The purpose study explore 8.5 F plastic stent proximal flap prevent post-ERCP cholangitis ERCP patient choledocholithiasis .
DOC.criteria: Obtention write informed consent ; Patient choledocholithiasis ; Common bile duct stone remove clearlly . No write informed consent ; Combined acute pancreatitis , acute cholangitis preERCP ; Patient 18 75 year .
